channel.title: Help with making a ::command
channel.description:
[b]HELP[/b]
I need Help with making a ::command Command in my server and i have no idea, can some one please teach me or Post the code? i really need your help. THANK-you Very much!!

item.title: Help with making a ::command
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

-,- are you using PI or Delta
this is for delta

				if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
				        sendQuest("~Paradise Commands~", 8144);  //Title
					sendQuest("", 8145);
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("::resetatk - resets your atk if under 10k EXP", 8148);
					sendQuest("::resetstr - resets your str if under 10k EXP", 8149);
					sendQuest("::resetdef - resets your def if under 10k EXP", 8150);
					sendQuest("::clearinv - deletes your inventory permanently", 8151);
					sendQuest("::players - shows how many players are online", 8152);
					sendQuest("::changepassword - changes your password", 8153);
					sendQuest("::donationinfo - shows information about donating", 8154);
					sendQuest("::removedonor - removes donor crown permanently", 8155);
					sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
				}

this is for PI

				if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
				        c.getPA().sendQuest("~Paradise Commands~", 8144);  //Title
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
					c.clearPlayersInterface();
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::resetatk - resets your atk if under 10k EXP", 8148);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::resetstr - resets your str if under 10k EXP", 8149);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::resetdef - resets your def if under 10k EXP", 8150);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::clearinv - deletes your inventory permanently", 8151);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::players - shows how many players are online", 8152);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::changepassword - changes your password", 8153);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::donationinfo - shows information about donating", 8154);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("::removedonor - removes donor crown permanently", 8155);
					c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
					c.flushOutStream();
				}

Read full topic
